title: Contextual Mathematics Vocabulary and Science Project Learning in EMI (English as a Medium of Instruction) Settings

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematics and science knowledge, fundamental English communication skills
context.additional_context: Learning environment composed of professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields. Limited technology environment with only smartphones and simple digital tools available. Support for EMI (English Medium Instruction) adaptation through gamification and context-based vocabulary learning

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and solve mathematical problems in science projects in English within an EMI (English as a Medium of Instruction) environment.
Using gamification (e.g., vocabulary matching games), learners can understand and utilize over 80% of specialized scientific mathematical terminology accurately.
Through PBL (Project-Based Learning), learners can present and submit project outcomes in English that apply mathematical vocabulary to real scientific scenarios.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
